name: Clockwork Orphan
description: Raised in the industrial underbelly, you learned to survive among discarded machines and forgotten technology.

feature.name: Urban Scavenger
feature.description: You can easily find useful scraps and tools in industrial ruins.

name: Steamwright's Apprentice
description: You trained under a master inventor, learning the delicate balance of magic and mechanics.

feature.name: Workshop Access
feature.description: You can request blueprints and materials from your former mentor's workshop.

name: Arcane Archivist
description: You spent years studying magical texts and technological blueprints, unlocking hidden knowledge.

feature.name: Lore Recall
feature.description: You have an uncanny ability to recall arcane and engineering knowledge.

name: Guild Operative
description: You worked for a powerful guild controlling access to rare magical technology.

feature.name: Guild Connections
feature.description: You have access to underground markets and restricted blueprints.

name: Urban Innovator
description: A self-made inventor, you've turned discarded junk into groundbreaking gadgets.

feature.name: Scrapyard Genius
feature.description: You can create makeshift tools and minor gadgets on the fly.

name: Ethereal Envoy
description: You mediate between the mechanical world and the arcane realm, balancing both energies.

feature.name: Mystic Negotiator
feature.description: You have an innate ability to communicate with both spirits and constructs.

name: Steamborne Nomad
description: A wanderer exploring industrial ruins, you have an eye for lost relics and forgotten magic.

feature.name: Wasteland Survival
feature.description: You can identify valuable artifacts and detect hidden machinery.

name: Runic Forger
description: You craft enchanted items by fusing ancient runes with modern technology.

feature.name: Runesmith
feature.description: You can inscribe temporary magical effects on metal objects.
